errormessages.requiredcomment: Please fill in the Comment field.
errormessages.requiredname: Please fill in the Name field.

listpage.errormessage: A configuration error has occured. Either IsTagListing or IsDateListing must be true.

errormessage.categorytoolong: At least one of the tag names is too long. (Max. 64 characters)

tagstatisticsupdater.description: Used for updating the blog tag statistics.

captcha.errormessage: The text entered does not match the text shown in the image.
captcha.heading: User verification
captcha.label: Please enter the text shown in the image:

messages.confirmdelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

filemanager.disabledfunctions: Some functions are not available since you don't have sufficient access rights for this folder.

errormessage.checkedout: A file with the same name already exists and is checked out by someone else.
errormessage.insufficientaccess: You don't have sufficient access rights to create or modify files in this folder.
errormessage.insufficientaccesscreatefolder: You don't have sufficient access rights to create folders in this location.
errormessage.insufficientaccessmetadata: You don't have sufficient access rights to modify this file.
errormessage.insufficientaccessmove: You don't have sufficient access rights to move this item.
errormessage.insufficientaccessremove: You don't have sufficient access rights to remove the selected items.
errormessage.insufficientaccessrename: You don't have sufficient access rights to rename the selected item.
errormessage.readonlyfile: A read-only file with the same name already exists.
errormessage.replacefile: A file with the same name already exists. Do you want to replace the file {0}?
errormessage.cannotchange: Unable to move, rename, delete or update the selected file. This file may be checked out by someone else.
errormessage.containscheckedout: Unable to move or delete selected directory. The directory may contain a file that is checked out by someone else.
errormessage.versioningisnotsupported: Unable to perform operation. Versioning is not supported.
errormessage.versionisnotfound: Unable to perform operation. Version {0} is not found.

filemanager.foldernotemptywarning: Some of the folders are not empty. Any content in them will be deleted.
filemanager.maxuploadmessage: The size of the file to be uploaded may not exceed {0}.
filemanager.missingfoldererror: The file could not be created. Either a target folder is missing, or you are not authorized to create files in the specified folder.
filemanager.selectfilemessage: Select a file with the Browse button below and then click "Upload".

validation.folderexists: A folder or file with the same name already exists.
validation.nametolong: Folder name cannot be longer then 255 characters.

forumlist.heading: Sub forums -
forumlist.setuperror: The page is not setup correctly. Please verify your settings.
forumlist.title: Forum

property.name: ActiveThreadContainer
property.caption: Container for active threads
property.help: The container for the active threads in this forum.

property.name: AllowForums
property.caption: Allow sub-forums in this forum
property.help: State whether this forum can contain sub-forums.

property.name: AllowThreads
property.caption: Allow threads in this forum
property.help: State whether this forum can contain threads.

property.name: ArchiveThreadContainer
property.caption: Container for archived threads
property.help: The container for the archived threads in this forum.

property.name: BlogStart
property.caption: Blog start page
property.help: The start page of the blog that this blog item belongs to.

property.name: CalendarContainer
property.caption: Show calendar from
property.help: Specify a place in the menu tree from where the calendar will be displayed. Usually this page.

property.name: CalendarItemContainer
property.caption: Calendar start
property.help: Show calendar posts from this page

property.name: DateContainer
property.caption: Container for date pages
property.help: Should be set automatically.

property.name: Details
property.caption: Personal details
property.help: Enter a short description of the blogger.

property.name: DisableAnonymousComments
property.caption: Deny comments from anonymous users
property.help: State whether anonymous users are allowed to post comments to blog entries.

property.name: EventStartDate
property.caption: Start date
property.help: Specify the start date for the activity.

property.name: EventStopDate
property.caption: Stop date
property.help: Specify the stop date for the activity.

property.name: FeedCount
property.caption: Number of items in a feed
property.help: The number of items that should be sent out in an RSS/Atom feed.

property.name: ForumStart
property.caption: Start page of a forum
property.help: The start page of the forum that the forum item belongs to.

property.name: HistoryLength
property.caption: Max. age of listed items
property.help: Maximum age of items, in days, that should be viewed in the list.

property.name: Icon
property.caption: The icon for this forum
property.help: The name of the icon this forum should use.

property.name: IndexContainer
property.caption: Display content from page
property.help: Specify the page from which the index will start

property.name: IsDateListing
property.caption: Date listing
property.help: Should be set automatically.

property.name: IsLocked
property.caption: Thread is locked
property.help: States whether this thread is locked.

property.name: IsTagListing
property.caption: Tag listing
property.help: Should be set automatically.

property.name: IsTeamLevel
property.caption: Team level
property.help: Should be set automatically.

property.name: ListingSlideContainer
property.caption: Downloading presentations
property.help: Select the page you want to download a presentation from

property.name: ListingSlideCount
property.caption: Show number of pages in presentation
property.help: In whole numbers, specify how many pages are to be displayed in the presentation

property.name: MainLinksCount
property.caption: Display number of links
property.help: Using an integer, specify the number of links to be displayed in the listing

property.name: MainLinksRoot
property.caption: Fetch left listing from
property.help: Specify the page from which you want to fetch the listing.

property.name: MaxCount
property.caption: Max. number of posts
property.help: Maximum number of posts viewed in the list.

property.name: nDaysToRender
property.caption: Number of days to show in calendar
property.help: Specify an integer for how many days you want to show in the calendar.

property.name: NumberOfReplies
property.caption: Number of replies
property.help: The number of replies that has been made to this thread.

property.name: PageAlphanumericChars
property.caption: Character set to use for page listing
property.help: Default is ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

property.name: RecentContainer
property.caption: Display pages from
property.help: Specify the page from which you want to display the recently changed pages

property.name: RecentHours
property.caption: Display the pages that have been changed in the past x hours
property.help: Specify how far back you want to display changed pages, using an integer for the number of hours

property.name: RefreshRate
property.caption: Number of seconds each page is to be displayed
property.help: In whole numbers, specify how many seconds each page is to be displayed in the presentation

property.name: SecondaryLinksCount
property.caption: Display number of links
property.help: Using an integer, specify the number of links to be displayed in the listing

property.name: SecondaryLinksRoot
property.caption: Fetch right listing from
property.help: Specify the page from which you want to fetch the listing.

property.name: SelectedWebPart
property.caption: Select Web Part
property.help: Selects which Web Part to use on the page

property.name: StickyThreadContainer
property.caption: Container for sticky threads
property.help: The container for the sticky threads in this forum.

property.name: SummaryTextLength
property.caption: Length of text summary
property.help: Number of characters used to truncate the summary text.

property.name: TagCloudValue
property.caption: Tag cloud value
property.help: Should be set automatically.

property.name: TagContainer
property.caption: Container for tag pages
property.help: Should be set automatically.

property.name: Tags
property.caption: Tags
property.help: Enter a comma-separated list and/or add from existing tags

property.name: TemplateContainer
property.caption: Workroom templates
property.help: A reference to the container that contains avaliable workroom templates.

property.name: UsageStatistics
property.caption: Statistics for tag usage
property.help: Should be set automatically.

property.name: ValidDays
property.caption: Recurring day
property.help: Specify if the activity is to recur at set intervals.

property.name: VideoSourceURL
property.caption: Video file
property.help: Specify a video file in .flv format.

property.name: WorkroomIcon
property.caption: Icon image for this workroom
property.help: An image to use as the icon for this workroom.

property.name: WorkroomStart
property.caption: Start page for this workroom
property.help: The start page of the workroom that this page belongs to.

property.name: Writer
property.caption: Blogger name
property.help: Enter the name of the blogger.
